author: LIDIA'S RESTAURANT
title: Strawberry Gelato
ingredients: 1/2 cup chopped strawberries in syrup, such as Fabbri, plus 3 tablespoons syrup from the jar, plus more for serving
instructions_list: Whisk the cream and sweetened condensed milk in a large bowl until light and foamy. Transfer to an ice cream machine and churn according to manufacturersâ€™ instructions. When the gelato is almost done, add the strawberries, syrup, vanilla, and almond extract through the feed tube. Churn 5 minutes more, until very thick.
Pack into a lidded container and freeze until firm, at least 4 hours. Scoop into bowls to serve, topping with more strawberries and syrup.
